content:
Hi. Can you come up with a tagline for a Cloud Economics marketing campaign that encapsulates the following? "In uncertain economic times, every dollar your business can save matters. We help your organization reduce cloud computing expense and free up valuable resources that can improve your balance sheet or be redirected to areas of critical need. 

Across almost all categories, companies are showing an increased emphasis on cost controls and returning economic value to their shareholders and investors. Whether it’s through widespread layoffs, reduction in major capital projects or reluctance to sign big SOWs, companies are clearly more reluctant to commit spend during economic uncertainty. The need for controlling costs is at an all-time high."
